Topic.Title: Creating a list of options in the quest web editor?

Posts.EditableText:
Hello all!
I remember under quest version 4, there was a branch of options, one of which allowed you to show a menu of options.
Is that option still available, and how is that done?
I did read the topic that was posted a little while about the new showmenu, someone linked to an article. I read it, but I have absolutely no idea where to even begin trying to fit it in.
Can someone help my brain from melting? Simple, but, I am having a hard time with it with the web version.
Thanks everyone!
